name: The 32 Random Rooms of Radioactive Doom
name_original: The 32 Random Rooms of Radioactive Doom
description:
This is the sequel to The 16 Random Rooms of Radioactive Doom, adding 16 more rooms, two-player support, and some new tiles and enemies.

1P Controls: Press Z to start, X to jump and arrow keys to move, Z to fire.
2P Controls: Press Q to jump and ESDF to move, tab/W to fire.
